/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky speckled with white clouds. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is a blend of urban life and natural beauty, showcasing the vibrant cityscape of Beijing.
